- Clerk Authentication
- PlanetScaler Database (My SQL)
- Shadcn-ui
- cloudinary
- next-cloudinary

* npx prisma init -y
* npx prisma generate
* npx prisma db push
* npx prisma migrate reset
* npx prisma db push --preview-feature

* stripe login

`npm i -g npm-check-updates`
`ncu -u`
`npm i`
`npm i npm-check-updates -u`
